example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 批))) (CP (WHNP-4 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (LCP (NP (NN 国际)) (LC 上))) (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (NN 影响))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NP (ADJP (JJ 大)) (NP (NN 财团))) (PU 、) (NP (ADJP (JJ 大)) (NP (NN 企业))))) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 相继)) (PP-LOC (P 在) (NP-PN (NR 漳州))) (VP (VV 落户))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 同时)) (VP (VV 带动) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (ADJP (JJ 大)) (CLP (M 批)))) (NP (NN 中小企业))) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 投资) (NP-PN-OBJ (NR 漳州))))))) (PU 。))
